title: Update Contact card label/value to Projects and Google Drive

requirements.summary: Change only the Google Drive contact card’s label and value text to exactly “Projects” and “Google Drive” while keeping the existing href.
acceptanceCriteria: The contact item corresponding to the third <a> in Contact section shows label text exactly "Projects" (replacing the previous label).
The same contact item shows value text exactly "Google Drive" (replacing the previous value).
No other labels/values in the Contact section are changed.
The Google Drive link target (href) remains unchanged and still points to the existing data.googleDrive URL.

file_operations.description: Update ONLY the HardDrive (Google Drive) contactItems entry so its `label` string is exactly "Projects" and its `value` string is exactly "Google Drive", without changing `href: data.googleDrive` and without modifying any other contact item text (to match the two provided XPath-selected text nodes).
